name: keylite-kv
description: Node.js bindings for Keylite key-value store

scripts.simple: bun build simple.ts --outfile simple.js --target=node && node simple.js
scripts.example: bun build example.ts --outfile example.js --target=node && node example.js
scripts.test: rm -rf test_db && bun build test.ts --outfile test.js --target=node && node test.js && rm -rf test_db
